extensionDescription.message: A ntfy-browser extension to receive notifications without having the page open

optionsEmptyTitle.message: You haven't configured any topics yet.
optionsEmptyTitle.description: Title when there are no topic configured yet.

optionsEmptyInstructions.message: Click on the "Add topic" button below to add a new one.
optionsEmptyInstructions.description: Instructions when there are no topic configured yet.

optionsTopicLabel.description: Label shown above input field for Topic.

optionsHostnameLabel.description: Label shown above input field for Hostname.

optionsFieldRequired.description: Shown whan a field is not filled, but required

optionsFieldInvalidUrl.message: This field does not seem to be a URL, ensure it starts with http:// or https://
optionsFieldInvalidUrl.description: Shown whan a URL field is invalid

optionsFieldTooLong.message: This field can only be $MAX_LENGTH$ long
optionsFieldTooLong.description: Shown whan a field value is too long

optionsFieldTooShort.message: This field has to be at least $MIN_LENGTH$ long
optionsFieldTooShort.description: Shown whan a field is too short

optionsFieldInvalidCharacters.message: This field contains invalid characters, ensure to only use letters, numbers, - and _
optionsFieldInvalidCharacters.description: Shown when a field value contains non allowed characters

optionsTokenLabel.description: Label shown above input field for Token.

optionsTokenHint.message: Leave empty when authorization is not required
optionsTokenHint.description: Hint shown below input field for token.

optionsRemoveTopic.description: Button label to remove a topic.

optionsAddTopic.description: Button label to add a topic.

optionsSnackbarSaveFailure.description: Shown after failing to save options

optionsSnackbarConnectionFailure.message: Failed to connect to topics: $FAILED_TOPIC_NAMES$. Please check the settings.
optionsSnackbarConnectionFailure.description: Shown when the configuration didn't result in a working connection

errorBoundaryTitle.description: Title when an unexpected error occurs

errorBoundaryDescription.message: This should obviously not happen. Very sorry about this.
errorBoundaryDescription.description: Description when an unexpected error occurs

errorBoundaryDescriptionGithub.message: If you have a minute please open an issue on Github.
errorBoundaryDescriptionGithub.description: Link text to point the user to opening an Github issue

errorBoundaryStackTraceTitle.description: Title above the stack trace when an unexpected error occurs

erroBoundaryStackTraceCopy.description: Button label to copy the stack trace when an unexpected error occurs

connectFailureNotificationTitle.description: Notification title shown when the extension failed to connect to a topic

connectFailureNotificationMessage.description: Notification message shown when the extension failed to connect to a topic
